desc: Satisfy your cravings with our best-tasting Asian-inspired protein powder. Known for having the top Milk Tea Protein in the world! Packed with Protein and BCAAs to aid muscle recovery and growth. Made with 100% Grass-Fed Whey Isolate Protein.

layout.text: YOUR POST-WORKOUT SHAKE DOESN'T HAVE TO BE DREADFUL ANYMORE. OUR PREMIUM FLAVORS WILL HELP YOU DISCOVER A NEW WORLD IN WHICH YOU CRAVE PROTEIN SHAKES LIKE NEVER BEFORE.
